title: Stage Lv6-P2-S11
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The project has been completed successfully.
The issue had been resolved before the meeting.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The project has been completed successfully.
The issue had been resolved before the meeting.

sentences.kr: 금요일까지 모든 작업이 완료되어 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: All tasks will have been finished by Friday.
The report has already been approved.
The new system had been successfully established.
The plan has not been approved yet.

sentences.kr: 모든 데이터가 다음 주까지 처리되어 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: All data will have been processed by next week.
The product has been tested multiple times.
